definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
expected date of childbirth/estimated due date (EDD)

sentences.english: This helps the doctor estimate how long you have been pregnant and your due date.
sentences.chinese: 這可以幫助醫生評估你懷孕的日期以及預定產期。
改善產前和圍產期護理。

sentences.english: To evaluate the clinical factors that affect the prognosis of peripartum cardiomyopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價影響圍產期心肌病預後的臨牀因素。

sentences.english: Deep understanding and management of polyhydramnios is helpful to improve perinatal outcomes.
sentences.chinese: 對羊水過多正確的認識和處理有助於改善圍產期結局。

sentences.english: Fetal movement (FM) monitoring is an important precautionary measure to prevent fetal death.
sentences.chinese: 胎動監護是預防圍產期胎死的一項重要措施。

sentences.english: She delivered exactly when the doctor predicted she would.
sentences.chinese: 她恰好在醫生所說的預產期分娩了。

sentences.english: She gave birth to a boy almost one month before the due date.
sentences.chinese: 她誕生了個男孩，比預產期早了將近一個月。

sentences.english: The couple's third child was more than a week early.
sentences.chinese: 這個小傢伙的出生日比預產期足足提前了一個多星期。

sentences.english: Only a small percentage of women actually deliver exactly on their due dates.
sentences.chinese: 能準確在其預產期生產的女人只有很小一部分。

sentences.english: Conclusion No obvious perinatal toxicity was observed in mouse administered with Shengxuening tablets.
sentences.chinese: 結論生血寧對小鼠無圍產期毒性作用。

sentences.english: My due date meant I'd miss next year's entire budget season.
sentences.chinese: 我的預產期意味着，我將參加明年的整個預算工作。

sentences.english: The baby isn’t due for another two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 預產期不在接下來這兩週內。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of collaborative care model in perinatal health care.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討協同式護理在圍產期應用的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship between genital mycoplasma infection and puerperal infection during perinatal period.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討圍產期生殖道支原體感染與產褥感染的關係。

sentences.english: According to the first day of last menstrual period of the calculation pre-production, was not sufficiently precise.
sentences.chinese: 按末次月經第一天起計算預產期，本來就不夠精確。

definition: expected date of childbirth/estimated due date (EDD)
abbr. for 產前檢查|产前检查[chan3 qian2 jian3 cha2]
to face childbirth/about to give birth/refers esp. to the onset of regular contractions
widely spread/widely rumored/stories abound/(sb's exploits are) widely circulated
(coll.) to bleed (esp. vaginal bleeding)/to suffer a financial loss
the state of play in an election/the current state of a candidate's campaign
woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
